title: effect
description: Defines a single, particular, longer term effect.

documentation.description: Human friendly documentation that can be stored with the (human unfriendly) JSON. For optimized systems, this attribute should be pruned at run time.

duration.description: Number of turns this effect will last. Default duration of -1 describes a permanent effect.

id.description: Unique id for a particular instance of this type.

magnitude.description: Power level of this particular effect. Not always applicable for an effect.

name.description: Unique name for this type of effect.
